cn.title: 关于恢复 SAFE 发币功能的公告

message.data: SAFE 的主网升级已经完成，比特派钱包目前已经针对 SAFE 新主网完成了调试和升级，现在已经重新开放 SAFE 发币功能，请升级 App 至最新版 v3.5.8 即可使用。
感谢您对比特派 Bitpie 的支持。

Bitpie 社群：
新浪微博：@比特派钱包 weibo.com/bitpiewallet
微信公众号：公众号搜索“比特派钱包”
Telegram：t.me/bitpie1

The upgrade of SAFE mainnet, is completed and Bitpie Wallet has finished the testing and upgrade targeting SAFE mainnet. Now the sending service of SAFE is resumed. Please upgrade your Bitpie Wallet to the latest version v3.4.6 and enjoy the sending service.
Thanks for your support to Bitpie Wallet.

Find us on
Telegram：t.me/BitpieInternational
Twitter：twitter.com/BitpieWallet
Medium :https://medium.com/@Bitpie
